column4: Hello! I'm currently thinking of changing from Win 2008 server to Ubuntu and was wondering which of the releases are the most stable one? is there any diffrence at all ?

releases are stable by definition (see ubottu's !sru factoid).  Your main decision is if you want to use 10.04 LTS (supported for 5 years after release on server) or the latest stable: 11.10 (supported for 18 months after release).  When support runs out, you simply upgrade release.  10.04 will not have software as new as 11.10
maybe with a ppa.  But if you have this requirement, I would recommend just using 11.10
